description:
Grab this seat bag for your next adventure so you can keep yourself extra hydrated, stash a tube and a multitool. Whether you’re going to work or a long ride, this bag can pack those important bits and another bottle too.

  • 100D ripstop bag is durable and light
  • Main zippered pocket with mesh inside pocket to organize your gear
  • Velcro fastener to attach to your bike
  • Flashlight holder and 3M strips for nighttime safety
name: Deuter Bike Bag 1.2 Bottle
